an9.39:4.1: “Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, devāsurasaṅgāmo samupabyūḷho ahosi.
an9.39:4.2: Tasmiṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, saṅgāme asurā jiniṃsu, devā parājayiṃsu.
an9.39:4.3: Parājitā ca, bhikkhave, devā apayiṃsuyeva uttarenābhimukhā, abhiyiṃsu asurā.
an9.39:4.7: Dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, devā asurehi saṅgāmesuṃ.
an9.39:4.8: Dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, asurāva jiniṃsu, devā parājayiṃsu.
an9.39:4.9: Parājitā ca, bhikkhave, devā apayiṃsuyeva uttarenābhimukhā, abhiyiṃsu asurā.
an9.39:5.4: Tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, devā asurehi saṅgāmesuṃ.
an9.39:5.5: Tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, asurāva jiniṃsu, devā parājayiṃsu.
an9.39:5.6: Parājitā ca, bhikkhave, devā bhītā devapuraṃyeva pavisiṃsu.
an9.39:5.7: Devapuragatānañca pana, bhikkhave, devānaṃ etadahosi:
an9.39:5.8: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dāni mayaṃ etarahi attanā viharāma akaraṇīyā asurehī’ti.
an9.39:5.10: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dāni devā etarahi attanā viharanti akaraṇīyā amhehī’ti.
an9.39:6.2: Tasmiṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, saṅgāme devā jiniṃsu, asurā parājayiṃsu.
an9.39:6.3: Parājitā ca, bhikkhave, asurā apayiṃsuyeva dakkhiṇenābhimukhā, abhiyiṃsu devā.
an9.39:6.7: Dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, asurā devehi saṅgāmesuṃ.
an9.39:6.8: Dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, devā jiniṃsu, asurā parājayiṃsu.
an9.39:6.9: Parājitā ca, bhikkhave, asurā apayiṃsuyeva dakkhiṇenābhimukhā, abhiyiṃsu devā.
an9.39:7.4: Tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, asurā devehi saṅgāmesuṃ.
an9.39:7.5: Tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, devā jiniṃsu, asurā parājayiṃsu.
an9.39:7.6: Parājitā ca, bhikkhave, asurā bhītā asurapuraṃyeva pavisiṃsu.
an9.39:7.8: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dāni mayaṃ etarahi attanā viharāma akaraṇīyā devehī’ti.
an9.39:7.10: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dāni asurā etarahi attanā viharanti akaraṇīyā amhehī’ti.
an9.39:8.1: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhussa evaṃ hoti:
an9.39:8.2: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dānāhaṃ etarahi attanā viharāmi akaraṇīyo mārassā’ti.
an9.39:8.4: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dāni bhikkhu etarahi attanā viharati akaraṇīyo mayhan’ti.
an9.39:9.1: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā … pe …
an9.39:9.4: catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhussa evaṃ hoti:
an9.39:9.5: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dānāhaṃ etarahi attanā viharāmi akaraṇīyo mārassā’ti.
an9.39:9.7: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dāni bhikkhu etarahi attanā viharati, akaraṇīyo mayhan’ti.
an9.39:10.1: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.39:10.2: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu antamakāsi māraṃ, apadaṃ vadhitvā māracakkhuṃ adassanaṃ gato pāpimato tiṇṇo loke visattikan’ti.
an9.39:11.1: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘anantaṃ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati …
an9.39:11.2: sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati …
an9.39:11.3: sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati …
an9.39:11.4: sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
an9.39:11.5: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu antamakāsi māraṃ, apadaṃ vadhitvā māracakkhuṃ adassanaṃ gato pāpimato tiṇṇo loke visattikan’”ti.
